Hello everyone!

Will anyone be looking for monoliths on the new planets? I guess there will be some, but I won\'t look for them because I never do. But what do you people think? There might be some arches too!
I\'d have to say.. more then likely.. yes
I would assume there would be some variants for monuments. With multiple planets, would be nice to have unique things on each.
I\'d like to see something unique and hidden, other than munoliths and arches. some caves would be nice, or even some tunnel systems! for those Uber skilled pilots lol

I\'d like to see something unique and hidden, other than munoliths and arches. some caves would be nice, or even some tunnel systems! for those Uber skilled pilots lol

If there is caves, il send a rover before my there and back rocket.. Some caves systems would be pretty nice
There\'s only one monolith outside Kerbin\'s local system, but it\'s going to be very hard to find. All other easter eggs are unique (at least one per planet/moon)
Will having read Space Odyssey 2001 help with locating it?

Will having read Space Odyssey 2001 help with locating it?

Nah, you guys don\'t get it that easy ;P
I am speculating that in the far future, Maybe discovering monoliths might give you an assist of some sort, Such as a bit of cash and/or a way to upgrade parts?

I am speculating that in the far future, Maybe discovering monoliths might give you an assist of some sort, Such as a bit of cash and/or a way to upgrade parts?

A while back I suggested that having to physically retrieve a monolith and return it to KSC would be a required component of the FTL drive that is already planned (the monolith ends up built into the drive itself,which I always envisaged as being massive and looking a bit like the ATLAS detector in the Large Hadron Collider

). It\'d make it nice and difficult to get, especially if monoliths (in campaign mode) were randomly placed... With a detector, of course.

Whether or not the Dev-team picked up on this, I have no idea.

Following research on the old relic at the KSC, scientists have discovered that it emits blah blah and have made a detector blah blah monoliths blah FTL etc etc.

Back on topic, I can\'t wait to see what else will be hanging around the solar system. Not as if I\'ll be the one finding any of it though. I still can\'t even find a monolith on the Mun...
